propelmodel.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 /**
00004  * pseudo propel model wrapper
00005  *  
00006  * @package kata_model
00007  */
00008 
00009 /**
00010  * include propel. a propel-installation must be in your include path (propel/classes)
00011  * @ignore
00012  */
00013 require_once 'propel/Propel.php';
00014 
00015 /**
00016  * include all neccessary classes and the given model.
00017  * 
00018  * you are supposed to put your propel-models inside models/. quoting the famous example
00019  * from the wiki the directory structure should look like this:
00020  * <samp>
00021  * models/books/conf/runtime-conf.php
00022  * models/books/Author.php
00023  * models/books/Book.php
00024  * models/books/Publisher.php
00025  * </samp>
00026  * 
00027  * @param string model name without .php - if null it just loads all needed classes
00028  * @package kata_model
00029  */
00030 function loadModel($name) {
00031          
00032          $name = preg_replace('/([A-Z])/g','$s|',$name);
00033          $names = explode('|',$name);
00034          
00035          $base = strtolower($names[0]);
00036          $sub = strtolower($names[1]);
00037          
00038          $modelfile = ROOT.'models'.DS.$base.'s'.DS.$sub.'.php';
00039          if (file_exists($modelfile)) {
00040                   propelInit::init($base);
00041                   require $modelfile;
00042                   return;
00043          }
00044          throw new Exception('loadModel: cant find propel class ['.$name.'], expecting models/'.$base.'/'.$sub.'.php');
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 /**
00049  * initkram
00050  * 
00051  * @package kata_model
00052  */
00053 class propelInit {
00054          
00055          static private $didInit = array();
00056          
00057          static function init($base) {
00058                   if (isset(self::$didInit[$base])) {
00059                            return;
00060                   }
00061                   
00062                   $conffile = ROOT.'models'.DS.$base.'s'.DS.'conf'.DS.'runtime-conf.php';
00063                   if (!file_exists($conffile)) {
00064                            throw new Exception('loadModel: cant find propel config for ['.$base.'] expecting '.$conffile);
00065                   }
00066                   
00067                   Propel::init( $conffile );
00068                   
00069                   self::$didInit[$base] = true;
00070          }
00071          
00072 }
